record.title: MOTION TO ADJOURN

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: SESSIONS
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.

record.chair: The question is on the motion to adjourn.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: SESSIONS
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

record.narrative: The yeas and nays were ordered.
record.chair: The Chair advises the House that the Chair intends to adhere to strict timelines when closing the first vote in subsequent vote series. The cooperation of all Members is appreciated.
